about.title: About This Blog
about.subtitle: A technical blog pursuing type safety and developer experience
about.conceptDescription1: This blog is a technical blog focused on improving type safety and developer experience (DX) in modern frontend development centered on Vue.js and Nuxt.
about.conceptDescription2: We share practical examples of how type systems play important roles in AI-era development.

about.author: Author
about.authorDescription: A frontend engineer passionate about improving type safety and developer experience. Exploring modern development methods centered on the Vue.js ecosystem and sharing practical insights.

seo.keywords: Vue.js, Nuxt, TypeScript, Type Safety, Developer Experience, DX
